entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 5:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
